DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect food pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics safety ASP1941 administration ASP1941 healthy non-elderly adult male subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Effect Food Absorption , Distribution Elimination ASP1941
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , open-label , 3-way crossover design study investigate effect food pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics safety ASP1941 administration ASP1941 healthy non-elderly adult male subject . Each subject receive single dose ASP1941 `` fast condition '' , `` meal '' `` meal '' .
DOC.criteria: Healthy judge investigator/subinvestigator base result physical examination laboratory test Body weight ; ≥50.0 kg , < 80.0 kg Body Mass Index ; ≥17.6 , < 26.4 Written inform consent obtain Received investigational drug within 120 day screen assessment Donated 400 mL whole blood within 90 day , 200 mL whole blood within 30 day , component within 14 day screen assessment Received medication within 7 day hospital admission A deviation assessment criterion physical examination laboratory test screen upon admission History drug allergy With renal , hepatic , gastrointestinal , heart , cerebrovascular respiratory disease
